alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; Northern San Joaquin Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:35PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tuolumne, east central San Joaquin, central Stanislaus, southeastern Alpine and south central Calaveras Counties through 945 PM PDT... At 833 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Modesto to Kennedy Meado. Movement was northeast at 18 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Modesto, Turlock, Ceres, Oakdale, Sonora, Riverbank, Waterford, Escalon, Salida, Pinecrest, West Modesto, Copper Cove Village, Kennedy Meadow, Dardanelle, Bret Harte, East Oakdale, Del Rio, Riverdale Park, Empire and Keystone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; Northern San Joaquin Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada
